original_text: Do not let me ever deceive people with lies. Do not let me be too rich or too poor. Give me only as much food as I need each day. Do not let me ever deceive people with lies.
korean_text: 곧 헛된 것과 거짓말을 내게서 멀리 하옵시며 나를 가난하게도 마옵시고 부하게도 마옵시고 오직 필요한 양식으로 나를 먹이시옵소서

sentences.original_text: Do not let me ever deceive people with lies
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 거짓말로 사람들을 속이지 않게 해주세요

sentences.original_text: Do not let me be too rich
Give me only as much food as I need each day
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 내가 필요한 만큼의 음식만 주세요

sentences.original_text: Do not let me ever deceive people with lies
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 거짓말로 사람들을 속이지 않게 해주세요
